results.title: Utility of support vector machine and decision tree to identify the prognosis of metformin poisoning in the United States: analysis of National Poisoning Data System
results.text_hl: With @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ incidence growing globally and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ still being the first-line for its treatment, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Overdose</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@ have been increasing.

results.title: [Lactic acidosis associated with metformin: A case series from the Saint-Denis hospital].
results.text_hl: A direct causal link between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Overdose</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@ and @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ is not clearly established.
